Text: I'm downloading now and ill report back after install and boot attempt! Thanks again FLT. Your MOH:WarFighter updated worked perfect and every other game is mint from ya! Keep up the good work :)

thx but game sucks balls, graphics are not bad, but seriously its very boring. just played 10 mins and deleted it.

I might sound like a noob, but how do I install this? I usually know how to install games, but this one is just weird. It has a bunch of numbed file times (example .001, .002, .003, ect..). I have absolutely no idea how to use these.

@WhorrorLoLz
install winrar or 7filezip. right click one of the files and extract it where you want. then you'll have the iso image. just mount it and install

I use this to play with my XBOX 360 Controller http://xpadder.com/ and it works with any gamepad  
you just have to google : xpadder

Those having issues with mouse acceleration kindly
open the nvidia control panel and change the max prerendered  frames settings to 0
@Muse Thanks! I wasn't working with WinRaR, but it worked with 7 Zip. =D
